text: Enrique Marlon Aguilar (born January 27, 2007) is a Swiss footballer. He plays as a forward for 2. Liga club Liefering. ==Club career== Aguilar began his career at FC Basel. In February 2023, the attacker moved to Austria to the FC Red Bull Salzburg academy. Homepage FC Salzburg For the 2024/25 season, Aguilar moved into the squad of the farm team FC Liefering. FC Liefering Homepage He made his debut in the 2nd league in August 2024 when he came on as a substitute for Zeteny Jano in the 88th minute on the second matchday of that season against SV Lafnitz. ==International == Aguilar played for a Swiss youth national team for the first time in September 2022. From August 2023 to October 2023, he played five times for the U-17 team. ==References== Category:2007 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:FC Liefering players
title: Enrique Aguilar
